main event: An observer reported seeing a flat, round object, resembling a basketball, making a sound comparable to a jet and moving at an extremely high rate of speed in Council Bluffs, Iowa on 05/14/53.
interesting points: The object was flat and round with orange and silver reflections,The observers were civilians aged around 15,The sighting lasted for about 30 seconds,The object attracted attention due to its sound,There were possible low-flying jets in the area during the sighting.
sighted object: one flat, round object the size of a basketball
